oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Words and Music Night - 2001-05-03
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Words and Music Night program held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 3, 2001. Hosted by Steve Wariner.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Steve Wariner;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Program begins in progress. Opening comments by Kyle Young. Introduction of Steve Wariner and comments by John Knowles. Performances include: Bossy Joe (Taylor Pie with Siobhan Hickerson and Courtney Waller) -- The Perfect Friend (Bob Spanburgh with Leah Blowes) -- We Like School (Steven Farmer with Kindergarten Club from Children's House) -- Shortness (Carol Ann Etheridge-Ford with David Crosby) -- Part Of My Heart Is Gone (Carol Ann Etheridge-Ford with Kelsey Horrick) -- Jerusalem (Kim Patton-Johnston with Danielle Dishy) -- The Beat (Kim Patton-Johnston with Ashley Whitacre) -- You Can't Change Me (James Nihand with Kyle Foresman) -- I Love You (James Nihand with Chelsey Hamm) -- When I Get Old (Dwight Liles with Sean McDonnell and Steven Pingle) -- Introduction of Justine Gregory -- About Words and Music -- The Dumb Song (Brian Hedges with Emily Perkins, Richard Percy and Jordan Jackson) -- My New Bike (Gregory Delang with Ashley Finch) -- A Family (Jeff Pearson with Julie Nabors) -- Snow Days (Taylor Pie with Lindsey Breedlove and Sammie Miller) -- My Angel (Simon McCain with Amy Millwood) -- Tornado (Clay Keith with Matt Grimes, Hiro Ichikawa and Jordan Caruthers) -- Scuba Steve (Kathy Hussey and Jason White with Anna Ezell and Lauren Gustafson) -- Searching For Her (Richard Fagan with Jordan Vandiver) -- Hey You (Richard Fagan with Natalie Phillips) -- Two Teardrops (Steve Wariner).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Wariner, Steve; education; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
